extensionDescription.message: Extension for highlighting DOM elements from a Site Alarm report in one click.

elementCount.description: Indicating the number of found elements

xpathRartitialy.message: Partial match. The xpath of the found element is shown in blue. Why is this happening?

xpathNotFound.message: Element not found. What is causing this?
xpathNotFound.description: Message indicating that an element was not found by XPath

xpathInvisible.message: The element was found in the page's DOM, but is hidden. What is causing this?
xpathInvisible.description: Message indicating that the element is not visible, but it is present.
